main event: A civilian reported observing a round, reddish-white object in the sky for approximately half an hour near Downing, Missouri on 6 February 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed at a distance of about 2 miles., It was round in shape and changed appearance at times., The sighting lasted for about half an hour., Investigation was conducted by knowledgeable witnesses on the spot., The object did not disappear when it went behind trees.
witness description: Civilian, Mr. David C. Farmer, Age 56
